policy:
This kit mimic a GitHub-like policy entrusting the governance of the branch to a pre-defined set of maintainers. Here is the exact policy enforced.

**RFC submission.** Anyone can submit RFC to this kit.
**RFC valuation.** RFCs can ONLY by valuated by the following maintainers: `dictators`
**RFC sorting.** RFCs can ONLY by sorted by the following maintainers: `dictators`

parameters.name: dictators
parameters.description: A whitelist address of dictators entrusted to valuate and sort RFC
